title: The owner shall have option to avail TDR over and above basic FSI instead of availing FSI with the payment of premium as mentioned in (i) above
clause_text: The owner shall have option to avail TDR over and above basic FSI instead of availing FSI with the payment of premium as mentioned in (i) above.
